card.title: Least likely to vote the same

info.lead: A list of 5 MPs who most often vote differently than the "vote of the parliamentary group". MPs are ranked in a descending order. The higher the value, the lower the voting matching.
text: We calculate the Euclidean distance between the results of parliamentary group's voting and everyone else's voting (votes are converted to numerical values between -1 and 1).
We calculate the "distance" between all the MPs, rank them based on the results and show the top 5.
The numerical values of the votes
